pipeline.description: Handles all customer login related storefront processes.

decision-node.condition-key: null != ContinuityObj && ContinuityObj != '' && ContinuityObj.lastShipp != null && ContinuityObj.lastShipp != '' && ContinuityObj.lastShipp.trackingUrl != null && ContinuityObj.lastShipp.trackingUrl != ''

text-node.description: This is a central place to login a user from the login form.
Handles redirect after login. A start node is set with the following variables. - TargetPipeline is the location of the pipeline - TargetPipelineParams are any parameters that need to be sent

Used in the following pipelines:
Account (Show, EditProfile) Address (List, Add, Edit, SetDefault, DeleteAddress) Cart (Login) COCustomer (Start) GiftRegistry (Start, AddProduct, Delete, Create) Order (History) PaymentsInstrument (List, Delete) PowerReviews (WriteReview) Wishlist (Show, Add)
This Pipline is for returning the json response for session activness.
This pipeline updates the authenticated user profile with the information returned from the middleware
